body_html: Also just to point other missing documentation we can specify how to mix tf metrics in tf.keras cause was requested in some Keras ticket but still not officially documented. We have some TF metrics that are not directly covered by tf.keras metrics counterpart so could be useful to document its use now the we are in the same tf root namespace.
body_text: Also just to point other missing documentation we can specify how to mix tf metrics in tf.keras cause was requested in some Keras ticket but still not officially documented. We have some TF metrics that are not directly covered by tf.keras metrics counterpart so could be useful to document its use now the we are in the same tf root namespace.
body: Also just to point other missing documentation we can specify how to mix [tf metrics in tf.keras](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45947351/how-to-use-tensorflow-metrics-in-keras) cause was requested in some Keras ticket but still not officially documented. We have some TF metrics that are not directly covered by tf.keras metrics counterpart so could be useful to document its use now the we are in the same tf root namespace.
